scripts.build-theme-css: npm run sass && npm run minify-css
scripts.build-fb-css: npm run facebook-post && npm run minify-facebook-post
scripts.build-ut-css: npm run unit-test-post && npm run minify-unit-test-post
scripts.build-css: npm run build-theme-css && npm run build-fb-css && npm run build-ut-css
scripts.merge-css:
echo '<style>' > partials/css/bundle.hbs && sh -c 'cat assets/css/bundle.min.css >> partials/css/bundle.hbs' && echo '
</style>' >> partials/css/bundle.hbs
scripts.deploy-css: npm run build-css && npm run merge-css
